ComicInfo.Title: The Descent
ComicInfo.Summary: The Descent: Ariel Chylde is plagued by nightmares but has enough on her mind in her waking life as her father has just moved her to the town of Salem, Georgia and she is preparing for her first day at a new school. Naturally shy, she balks when popular hunk Perry asks her to join him at the dam to hang out with a few friends. Instead she goes home and faces another nightmare as her drunk father comes into her room with nasty intentions. As she is struggling to stop him, she transforms into a hideous monster and burns him to death.
